title: The Night Thief
description: One last heist. One last gamble. I’m a woman on the run. A con artist, scamming my way into the rich for my livelihood and my Boss’. I set my eyes on one of the most popular casinos.The Moretti Casino.The problem is that the owners are two notorious mafia members of one of the most dangerous Families of New York. I slip in, posing as a royal princess, but then a pair of piercing blue eyes catches me red-handed. The tables have turned… I’m no princess, I’m a thief and he’s the mafia prince.Romeo Moretti.I’m given two choices: die or do his bidding. He has a plan for me. Three wishes he wants from me. And the last wish is… he wants me to rob a rival. I just hope I don’t gamble my heart away to him in the process.Welcome to New York’s Underworld.Loosely based on the fairytale Aladdin.
author: Beena Khan
